text: Ezɨ kamaghɨn, e deravɨra akar kam gɨnɨghnɨgham. Gumazir mam arazir kurar vamɨram amizɨ, kamaghɨn God ghaze, gumazamiziba bar moghɨra bar ikufi. Kamaghɨra, Gumazir Igharazir Vamɨra arazir aghuir Godɨn damazimɨn derazim gami. Kamaghɨn God gumazamiziba bar men gari, mati me arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ. Egh God me zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim me danɨngam.
